lenders.name: Saras Vision (An AMC)
lenders.loan_because:
Sohail Khan
Founder Chairman & Managing Director
International Certified Financial Consultants
Saras Vision (An Asset Management Company)
Mumbai
India
Website:
www.sarasvision.com
lenders.occupational_info:
International Certified Financial Consultants

We specialize in the below mentioned products;
a) Over Draft Facility in INR Currency
b) Cash Credit Facility in INR Currency
c) Bills Discounting Facility in INR Currency
d) Bank Guarantees Facility in INR / Foreign Currency
e) Term Loan in INR / Foreign Currency
f) Packing Credit Facility (pre-shipment) in INR / Foreign Currency
g) Packing Credit Facility (post-shipment) in Foreign Currency
h) PCFC in Foreign Currency (LIBOR)
i) Factoring - Domestic & Export in INR / Foreign Currency
j) Hedging Services for Foreign Currency
k) Forward Cover for Foreign Currency
l) Letter of Credit (Inland) in INR Currency
m) Letter of Credit (Import / Overseas) in Foreign Currency
o) Equity Funding in INR / Foreign Currency
p) Unsecured EMI Based SME Term Loan in INR Currency (max. INR 500 Lakhs)
q) Purchase Invoice Finance in INR Currency
r) Project Finance in INR / Foreign Currency
s) Bills of Exchange / Private Hundi Finance in INR Currency (Offer limited to Clients situated in Mumbai, India only)
t) Working Capital Limit in INR Currency
u) Line of Credit facility in Foreign Currency
v) Loans against Stocks/Shares in Foreign Currency

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I heard about this from a friend last year but unfortunately didn't remember to sign up. I strongly believe in helping people help themselves, and I think Kiva is a great way for me to use a small amount of my own money in a positive way.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: It is safer than keeping my money in US banks.
lenders.occupational_info:
My job requires me to work on medical research using mathematics and computers.

On occasion, I relax by feeding seagulls dried dog food.  The town I live in is by the ocean and I live on a little island renting a condo.

Beer is always good, too.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: there are people out there who are in more need than I

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because:
We live in a very big world but it is easy to get lost in our tiny personal sphere. Kiva helps me to step out of my day to day struggles and frustrations. Loaning on Kiva helps me to put my world in context and to remind myself how incredibly blessed I am. I loan because it is the very least I can do to express my gratitude for the gifts my life has given to me. 

By stepping outside my town, state, or country's needs on Kiva I feel that I can impact a world that is often hidden from my sight. It reminds me of the importance of helping strangers and spreading the blessings I have been given to those that are in greater need than I will ever experience. 

I loan to be an agent of change in a country that politically and socially has tied many of it's citizens hands. 

I loan because it fills my heart with love and joy in a disjointed world.

I loan to women specifically because, as a strong woman, I feel that it is my duty to support the empowerment and safety of other strong women that are risking life and limb every day just to care for their families. I do not discriminate against men in life or on Kiva but I have made a choice to loan only to women due to that desire.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Behavioral Ecology and Environmental Economics through Prescott College. The goal of my studies is to bring more sustainable results into the world of endangered species population restoration that I find so fascinating.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of Economics and Physics at Duke University.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people around the world! My goal is to make at least one loan in every country on Kiva.

lenders.name: MARTIN
lenders.loan_because: it, good to help people help themselves, and it's not that much money to help change someones life

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: It feels wonderful, and my kids learn that giving is precious

lenders.name: Monique
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a wonderful, sustainable way to make a small start on righting economic inequality.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working towards my PhD in philosophy.

lenders.name: Myron
lenders.loan_because: There's always someone out there that needs the 25 bucks more than I do.

lenders.name: OregonEconStudents
lenders.loan_because: We loan to learn economics, benefits of MFIs, and to develop world community ideals.
lenders.occupational_info: Instructor and economics students.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Micro-finance is a true and honest way to help people as opposed to temporary solutions.
lenders.occupational_info: I am looking for a job right now but in the long run I am studying to become an accountant.

lenders.name: Domenica  A Gonzales
lenders.loan_because: Creo que los prestamos son importantes para realizar cambios duraderos. Solidaridad es necesaria para el desarrollo de la comunidad.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with high-risk families, and I love it!

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want to extend a helping hand to those who are in need.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute my bit, no matter how small, to help the world's poor.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: micro finance encourages small business growth thereby empowering them to help their community.

lenders.name: Pierce
lenders.loan_because: I encourage people to be self-sufficient and I realize that sometimes they just need a little help.   Each dollar that I lend will be multiplied many times over when the entreprenuer's business becomes sustainable, and when I get it back I can loan it to the next entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their dream come true, and Kiva embodies the true spirit of an accessible global economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I make electric guitars, jewelry, artistic sculpture, and websites.  I am also a student at an American University.

lenders.name: Good Luck!
lenders.loan_because: Good Luck!
lenders.occupational_info: weejakers.com

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I feel everyone who works hard and is trying to better themselves should have a way to obtain what they need, and I feel fortunate to have enough to lend to others in hope that I can make their lives better and help them build their dream(s)
lenders.occupational_info: I am an analyst at one of the largest Insurance Companies in the United States, I gather data for the company and send it to various states, and organizations who request it. I reside in one of the most beautiful cities in the USA, Seattle, Washington.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs deserve a chance to succeed no matter where they live.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes, land, and businesses to and for people in my community.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because:
Matthew 25:40 
"The King will reply, 'Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me.'

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.loan_because: People who have resources should share with those who don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I help nonprofits use the internet and web in order to be more effective in doing their jobs.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.occupation: I work with emerging genome sequencing technology.
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to the people of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with DNA sequencing technology to help understand how medicine affects individuals.

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I acknowledge that a million small sacrifices can make one world of a difference.

lenders.name: Mathew
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make the internet work, and hopefully help others.

lenders.name: Hanna
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people can change their lives when given the opportunity. Microfinancing is this kind of an oppourtunity. It costs me so little, but can do so much good.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Political Science senior. I also work as a waitress.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: Investments of love, time, labor and money (given in that order) work.
lenders.occupational_info:
I believe I can invest a $15,000 "nest-egg" in the futures market and obtain a return of about $3000 a month. I believe I can double the nest-egg in a year and likewise double the return.

Is it risky?  Yes.  I could easily loose it all in a month.

Why am I doing this?  (1)  I retired early with not quite enough savings to see me through -- I'm short about $2000 a month.  (2) I spent my life (all 62 years of it) wasting time.  I do not want to have on my tombstone the inscription "Here lies a man who did nothing -- God is NOT pleased". (3) So before the sun sets on my life I make a difference in the lives of others by investing in those charities that feed to world's hungry and care for the world's needy.  (4) So I will devote to these charities all the investment earnings not needed to support my modest lifestyle (5) This is 99% about spiritual improvement and 1% about making money.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: "Say NO to terrorism. Start a business!"
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Deputy Sheriff for a small mountain community,as well as, a Soldier for the United States Army National Guard. I have served in Iraq and Afghanistan. I like to hike outdoors and I enjoy Beer in the city with friends.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that I can help someone while allowing them to maintain their own independence and sense of self-worth. I like the idea that I might be assisting someone to make a step forward for themselves and their community...
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company to manage the long and short term risks of undertaking its principal business activities.

lenders.name: Sergio
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people from around the world, especially the ones that really need!
lenders.occupational_info: My main activity is the detailing and calculation of civil engineering structures (armed concrete and steel)

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: we are lucky enough to have opportunities to create our own wealth and we want to share
lenders.occupational_info: Our No Tall Poppies network was created to provide an opportunity for nurturing; support; achievement without glory; on-going renewal; Have a closer look at a field of poppies. We love the way they grow in a group. Some heads slightly bowed; some faces lifting to the sun – and, just occasionally one or two taller poppies. If you are a tall poppy, or not, you will find many friends at Kiva.

lenders.name: Geurt en Wennie
lenders.loan_because: I can
